name: Dhruv Bhatia
readme_content:
👋 Hi, I’m Dhruv Bhatia (@dhruvbhatia1)

📚 I have a strong understanding of Data Structures and Algorithms, and I'm proficient in Java for Object-Oriented Programming.

👨‍💻 I'm a MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack developer with experience in building web applications.

🔭 I have basic knowledge of Machine Learning and have worked on projects involving ML algorithms.

💼 I'm actively seeking opportunities to contribute to Open Source communities and learn from people around the world.

📫 You can reach me via email at dbhatia03@gmail.com

🌐 Check out my projects on [GitHub](https://github.com/dhruvbhatia1)



Feel free to connect with me and explore my projects!


<!---
dhruvbhatia1/dhruvbhatia1 is a ✨ special ✨ repository because its `README.md` (this file) appears on your GitHub profile.
You can click the Preview link to take a look at your changes.
--->

dhruvbhatia1/devTinder-backend.summary: Recent activities in the devTinder-backend repository have focused on enhancing authentication mechanisms. This includes the implementation of user authentication middleware, refactoring of authentication logic, and the introduction of JWT token logic for secure token management. Additionally, efforts have been made to improve data security through data sanitization and the encryption of passwords during the signup process, ensuring a more robust and secure user experience.

profile_summary: I'm Dhruv Bhatia, a skilled developer with expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python, leveraging my strong understanding of Data Structures and Algorithms to build scalable web applications using the MERN stack. With experience in Machine Learning and a portfolio of 33 public repositories, I'm committed to contributing to Open Source communities and collaborating with like-minded professionals. As a dedicated developer with a growing network of 3 followers, I'm excited to explore new opportunities and share my projects with the world.
